overview: From DOC NYC program notes: Music and clowns are my brotherâ€™s two great passions in life. Jamie is close to nonverbal so the rest of the family are left filing in the gaps when we discuss what life is like for him. Our differing perspectives show as much about us as they do Jamie.  From New York Times Op-Docs listing: What I wish people understood about having a family member with Down syndrome.
title: Music & Clowns
